at.irian.ankor.switching.connector

Interface ConnectionHandler<P extends ModelAddress>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketConnectionHandler, StatefulSessionConnectionHandler, StatelessSessionConnectionHandler, WebSocketConnectionHandler

    public interface ConnectionHandler<P extends ModelAddress>
    Connector-specific handler for opening an closing connections between model instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection(ModelAddress sender, P receiver, boolean lastRoute, HandlerScopeContext context)
      Given sender tells us that it is closing the connection to the given Connector-specific receiver.
      void openConnection(ModelAddress sender, P receiver, Map<String,Object> connectParameters, HandlerScopeContext context)
      Handle a connect request from the given sender to the given Connector-specific receiver.

    • Method Detail

      • openConnection

        void openConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                  P receiver,
                  Map<String,Object> connectParameters,
                  HandlerScopeContext context)
        Handle a connect request from the given sender to the given Connector-specific receiver.
        Parameters:
        sender - address of party that wants to connect
        receiver - address of party that
        connectParameters - application specific parameters
        context - context for sharing custom attributes in "handler scope"

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                   P receiver,
                   boolean lastRoute,
                   HandlerScopeContext context)
        Given sender tells us that it is closing the connection to the given Connector-specific receiver.
        Parameters:
        sender - address of party that initiated the closing of the connection
        receiver - address of party that shall be closed
        lastRoute - true, if this is the last route to the given receiver
        context - context for sharing custom attributes in "handler scope"
